thread.title: Monmouth’s Josh James progressing with latest injury
thread.title_full: Monmouth’s Josh James progressing with latest injury

author: app.com
title: Monmouth’s Josh James progressing with latest injury
text:
MORE WEST LONG BRANCH – Give Josh James some credit because if nothing else, the last 10 months have taught the Monmouth University junior guard the value of patience and mental toughness.
On Jan. 2, after starting 11 of the Hawks’ first 13 games at shooting guard, James injured his left big toe at Canisius, sat for a month, then eventually had season-ending surgery on Feb. 9.
A recovery timetable of 3-6 months was given, but he healed quickly and was a full-go when Monmouth went to China in May. Armed with momentum and his health coming out of the China trip and a productive summer of working out, James’ resolve is being put to the test again.
